Row.Text: "[TAB][TAB]Two vast and trunkless legs of stone [NEWLINE] Stand in the desert. Near them, on the sand, [NEWLINE] Half sunk, a shattered visage lies, whose frown, [NEWLINE] And wrinkled lip, and sneer of cold command, [NEWLINE] Tell that its sculptor well those passions read [NEWLINE] Which yet survive, stamped on these lifeless things, [NEWLINE] The hand that mocked them and the heart that fed: [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] And on the pedestal these words appear: [NEWLINE] 'My name is Ozymandias, king of kings: [NEWLINE] Look on my works, ye Mighty, and despair!' [NEWLINE] Nothing beside remains." [NEWLINE] --Excert from Shelley's "Ozymandias"
Double the normal number of trade routes available. Venetian Merchant replaces Great Merchant.

[TAB][TAB]Scholars of the Jade Hall[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] +2 [ICON_RESEARCH] science for all specialists and for all Great Person tile improvements. Receive a tech boost each time a scientific building/Wonder is built in your capital.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Treasures of Ninevah[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] When a city is conquered, gain a free Technology already discovered by its owner. Gaining a city through a trade deal does not count, and it can only happen once per enemy city.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Iklwa[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Melee units cost 50% less maintenance. All units require 25% less experience to earn their next promotion.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Art of War[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] The Great General combat bonus is increased by 15%, and their spawn rate is increased by 50%.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Bushido[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Units fight as though they were at full strength even when damaged. +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from each Fishing Boat and +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from each Atoll.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Scourge of God[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Raze Cities at double speed. Borrow City names from other in-game Civs. Start with Animal Husbandry technology. +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production per Pasture.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Furor Teutonicus[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Upon defeating a Barbarian unit inside an encampment, there is a 67% chance you earn 25 [ICON_GOLD] Gold and they join your side. Pay 25% less for land unit maintenance.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Barbary Corsairs[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] All melee naval units have the Prize Ships promotion, allowing them to capture defeated ships. Pay only one-third the usual cost for naval unit maintenance.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Great Expanse[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Founded cities start with additional territory. Units receive a combat bonus when fighting within their own territory.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Manifest Destiny[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] All land military units have +1 sight. 50% discount when purchasing tiles.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Sun Never Sets[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] +2 [ICON_MOVES] Movement for all naval units. Receives 1 extra Spy.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Siberian Riches[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Strategic Resources provide +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and Horse, Iron and Uranium Resources provide double quantity.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Monument Builders[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] +20% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production towards Wonder construction.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Achaemenid Legacy[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Ages last 50% longer. During a Golden Age, units receive +1 [ICON_MOVES] Movement and a +10% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength bonus.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] The Glory of Rome[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] +25% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production towards any buildings that already exist in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] The Great Warpath[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Units move through Forest and Jungle in friendly territory as if it is Road. These tiles can be used to establish [ICON_CONNECTED] Trade Routes upon researching The Wheel.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Great Andean Road[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Units ignore terrain costs when moving into any tile with Hills. No maintenance costs for improvements in Hills; half cost elsewhere.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Partial Phoenician Heritage[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Units may cross mountains after the first Great General is earned, taking 50 HP damage if they end a turn on a mountain.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Wayfinding[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Can embark and move over Oceans immediately. +1 Sight when embarked. +10% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength bonus if within 2 tiles of a Moai.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Viking Fury[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Embarked units have +1 Movement [ICON_MOVES] and pay just 1 movement point to move from sea to land. Melee units pay no movement point cost to pillage.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] River Warlord [NEWLINE] Receive triple [ICON_GOLD] Gold from Barbarian encampments and pillaging Cities. Embarked units can defend themselves.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Sacrificial Captives[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Gains [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for the empire from each enemy unit killed.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Solidarity[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Receive a free Social Policy when you advance to the next era.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] City of Light[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Museum and World Wonder theming bonuses are doubled in their capital.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] The Long Count[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] After researching Theology, receive a bonus Great Person at the end of every Maya Long Count calendar cycle (every 394 years). Each bonus person can only be chosen once.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Patriarchate of Constantinople[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Choose one more Belief than normal when you found a Religion.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Carnival[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Tourism [ICON_TOURISM] output is +100% during their Golden Ages. Earn Great Artists, Musicians, and Writers 50% faster during their Golden Ages.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Seven Cities of Gold[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] [ICON_GOLD] Gold bonus for discovering a Natural Wonder (bonus enhanced if first to discover it). [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness, and tile yields from Natural Wonders doubled.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] The Most Serene Republic[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Double the normal number of trade routes available. Merchant of Venice replaces Great Merchant.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Hellenic League[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] City-State [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence degrades at half and recovers at twice the normal rate.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Nobel Prize[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Gain 90 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with a Great Person gift to a City-State. When declaring friendship, Sweden and their friend gain a +10% boost to Great Person generation.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Father Governs Children[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] [ICON_FOOD] Food and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from friendly City-States increased by 50%.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]
hamdawg87's ultimate civilization mod[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]"Look on my works ye mighty, and despair."

"I am great OZYMANDIAS," saith the stone,[NEWLINE] "The King of Kings; this mighty City shows[NEWLINE] The wonders of my hand."— The City's gone,—[NEWLINE] Nought but the Leg remaining to disclose[NEWLINE] The site of this forgotten Babylon.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] We wonder,—and some Hunter may express[NEWLINE] Wonder like ours, when thro' the wilderness[NEWLINE] Where London stood, holding the Wolf in chace,[NEWLINE] He meets some fragment huge, and stops to guess[NEWLINE] What powerful but unrecorded race[NEWLINE] Once dwelt in that annihilated place.
+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from each worked Forest tile. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Allows [ICON_PRODUCTION] to be moved from this city along trade routes inside your civilization.

The Ultimate Longhouse is a modified Iroquois unique building for use by the Ultimate Civilization, replacing the Workshop. It increases the city's [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production output for each forest within the city's radius, while also retaining the production bonus of the workshop
